label: ham
subject: Re: Simple Encryption - what function/module could I use?
body: Under the Republic, the _curiæ_ still confined to the four urban tribes, and including only the populace of Rome, suited neither the senate, which led the patricians, nor the tribunes, who, though plebeians, were at the head of the well-to-do citizens. They therefore fell into disrepute, and their degradation was such, that thirty lictors used to assemble and do what the _Comitia Curiata_ should have done.
